name: Get Back On Track
description:
Up above, life goes on from town to town, but it's about time someone connects them together! Who needs a subway when you have a network of mine carts! Get Back On Track is a fun little game where you mine for gems to buy tracks, then repair the broken ones with the ones you bought! Fend off bats, connect the tracks from one door to the other, and see how far you can go! See new areas and connect the world above through the network below! 

Controls: 

WASD - Movement

Left / Right Mouse Click - Throwing Picks and building tracks

Mouse Wheel  - Switching between different tracks

TAB - Toggling track building

Space Bar - Interact

R - Restart

Credits:

Zayna Kirlew - Pixel Artist & 2D Animator
